description: 风味图谱：锅底+主料 -> 推荐蘸料搭配（解辣/增香/提鲜）

sauce_recipe: 蒜泥 + 香油 + 香菜（解辣增香）
Garlic paste + sesame oil + cilantro (cools spice, adds fragrance)
rules.reason_cn: 牛油辣锅配内脏类，蒜泥香油经典搭配解辣
rules.reason_en: Spicy broth with offal: garlic and sesame oil classic pairing

sauce_recipe: 海鲜汁 + 小米椒 + 少许醋
Seafood sauce + bird's eye chili + a little vinegar
rules.reason_cn: 辣锅涮海鲜用海鲜汁提鲜
rules.reason_en: Spicy broth with seafood: seafood sauce enhances umami

sauce_recipe: 海鲜汁 + 牛肉粒 + 香菜（网红吃法）
Seafood sauce + beef bits + cilantro (popular combo)
rules.reason_cn: 番茄锅配肥牛/羊肉，海鲜汁+牛肉粒提鲜
rules.reason_en: Tomato broth with beef/lamb: seafood sauce + beef bits

sauce_recipe: 芝麻酱 + 腐乳 + 韭菜花（北方经典）
Sesame paste + fermented tofu + chive flower (northern style)
rules.reason_cn: 大骨清汤配肉菜，麻酱腐乳经典
rules.reason_en: Bone broth with meat and veg: sesame paste classic

sauce_recipe: 辣侧：干碟（辣椒面+花生碎+芝麻）
不辣侧：香油蒜泥或海鲜汁
Spicy side: dry dip (chili powder + crushed peanuts + sesame); Mild side: sesame oil + garlic or seafood sauce
rules.reason_cn: 鸳鸯锅可双蘸料，按涮哪边选
rules.reason_en: Yin-yang: two sauces for two sides

sauce_recipe: 蒜泥 + 香油 + 蚝油 + 香菜 + 葱花
default_sauce.reason_cn: 万能蘸料，适合多数锅底与食材
